reviews.review:
This is the best Avengers movie to date,

The entire movie was thrilling from beginning to end, In spite of all the characters in a single movie none of them felt rush and everyone got their fair share of screen time, Thanos is the best villian in any Marvel movie to date.

Just impressive how Disney/Marvel can continue to dish out these movies with such high quality.

The billion dollar cash grab, Avengers Infinity War is the culmination of over 10 year of Marvel Cinematic movies and follows the avengers as they unite to fight the battle against Thanos a being of immense power wanting to restore balance to the universe by wiping out half the population. The movie explores basic themes such as the significance of life and the meaning of sacrifice. The interaction between the characters is fun to watch even though the comedic parts of the movie are based heavily on the character calling each other funny names. The story is hard to grasp for people who aren't familiar with the marvel franchise and though most scenes are visually spectacular the movie does rely a great deal on cgi. In conclusion Avengers Infinity War is another solid entry in the series, that ends on an excellently placed cliff hanger and secures Marvel as one of the unstoppable juggernauts of the film industry.

Best Marvel movie yet! Pacing was a little off but I can get over that considering the difficulty of what they had to accomplish with this many characters. Writing was some of the best ever. Every conversation was extremely engaging, from humorous to sad, it was perfect.

After Ragnarok and Black Panther, I wondered if marvel could continue their streak of great movies and I certainly was not DISAPPOINTED. a brilliant villian 11 years in the works and a fantastic ENSEMBLE. Very funny, but also serious when it needed to be. It is a brilliant movie for a marvel fan which does a great job in rewarding its fanbase. I have seen the movie 4 times now and it only got better.
The beauty of this movie is the threat the villains pose. If the good guys can't lose, there is no threat. Now though, welcome to the real world. Welcome to infinity war.

This was exactly what I was hoping for. 
I was never a huge comic book fan but threw myself into the MCU since Iron Man, because that movie by Jon Favreau was THE brilliant introduction to what the comic book genre was supposed to look and feel like. 
Since then, there have been hits and misses and yet, when you review the whole story, the big picture, the years they've invested in writing and producing what we've seen so far, this GRAND story-line, like a trilogy-esque thing but, stretched out over a decade, well, it takes tremendous vision and work on behalf of an entire team who dedicate their actions and very lives to the hope for grand results. 
Well, this movie to me, is the proof that the mission, has been accomplished.
A grand story, absolutely AWESOME visual effects and action sequences and of course, the trademark humor we've come to love from the MCU. "You're all REALLY screwed now!" Can't wait to see what happens next! Great job Marvel! This is definitely, how it's done! Loved it!!

This movie was done very, very well! There are the occasional issues that I have with it, but that's fine. 
I commend the directors for being able to pull this movie off so well. A near parfect score from me!
This a great movie from the production to the acting and plot.  The only reason why i gave it a 4 and 1/2 is because the ending was too harsh for me.  Can't wait for the sequel!!
This movie was exactly what the MCU needed and I can't wait until Avengers 4, my only hope here is that Disney actually ends it on a high note.
amazing best super hero movie to date ðŸ¤©
